metadata.title: CVE-2018-1002102 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Improper validation of URL redirection in the Kubernetes API server inversions prior to v1.14.0 allows an attacker-controlled Kubelet to redirectAPI server requests from streaming endpoints to arbitrary hosts. ImpactedAPI servers will follow the redirect as a GET request withclient-certificate credentials for authenticating to the Kubelet.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
